author: Jason McDonald
comment: Updating my review.  Installation was a little wonky on the first attempt, but smooth on the second.  Set permissions on my phone for location based weather and that was it.  Beautiful and simple interface on watch for settings and a clean looking watch face have earned this a 5 star rating from me.  I looked for a good material design watch face long ago, and this one fits exactly what I was looking for.  It seems to be good on battery life, although I will wouldn't be upset to have a phone battery indicator in addition to the watch battery.

reply.author: PiFox Lab
reply.content:
Thank you the the feedback!,
We apologize for taking long to answer you.

Hope you will like it.

author: Andy
comment: Very nice and clean design. Would like the current temperature display on the main screen though - maybe opposite battery indication.

reply.author: PiFox Lab
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback. 
Your suggestion is appreciate, we will include that in the next update.
=D

author: Loren Perry
comment: Really like the simplicity of the material design of this watch face. It is nice to have the weather and battery status available at a glance. Definitely work trying if you like the material design.

reply.author: PiFox Lab
reply.content:
Hi Loren.

I believe you are using an older app version.
Update it, then you should receive a notification on your watch, tap on it and your phone will display the companion app download page. 

Otherwise, search your phone play store by "Material Watch Face".

Hope it works for you, please let me know.

author: Faye S
comment: I absolutely love the design of the watch face. I just wish that it had the ability to show the phone's battery and notifications on ambient mode.

author: caliburn777
comment: Nice, clean, easy to read watchface. Only thing worth mentioning is that the date shows up ending in 'th' even when it should end in 'nd' or 'rd' so 23th of September instead of 23rd for example .

reply.author: PiFox Lab
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback!
The date suffix has been fixed, you will receive the update in the next hour.
Have a nice day!

title: Pretty nice

author: Richard
comment: Really cool idea, but you can't customize the time format at all

reply.author: PiFox Lab
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback. 
Time format customization is now available!
It may take some hours until the update shows up to you!

author: Scott Readman
comment: Actually looks better than the other material design watch face but needs customisation and weather/temperature.

reply.author: PiFox Lab
reply.content:
Customization is being added.
It is now possible to change time format,
Next update will bring the option to change colors.

Thanks!

title: Looks good needs customisation
